verses.text: \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* ye unto your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w Ammi|strong="H5971"\w*; and to your \w sisters|strong="H0269"\w*, \w Ru-hamah|strong="H7355"\w*. \f + \fr 2.1 \ft Ammi: that is, My people\f*\f + \fr 2.1 \ft Ru-hamah: that is, Having obtained mercy\f*

\w Plead|strong="H7378"\w* with your \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \w plead|strong="H7378"\w*: for she \add is\add* not my \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, neither \add am\add* I her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*: let her therefore put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* her \w whoredoms|strong="H2183"\w* out of her \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, and her \w adulteries|strong="H5005"\w* from between her \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w*;

Lest I \w strip|strong="H6584"\w* her \w naked|strong="H6174"\w*, and \w set|strong="H3322"\w* her as in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that she was \w born|strong="H3205"\w*, and \w make|strong="H7760"\w* her as a \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and \w set|strong="H7896"\w* her like a \w dry|strong="H6723"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* her with \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*.
And I will not have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* upon her \w children|strong="H1121"\w*; for they \add be\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w whoredoms|strong="H2183"\w*.

For their \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* hath played the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*: she that \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* them hath done \w shamefully|strong="H3001"\w*: for she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* my \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, that \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add me\add* my \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and my \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, my \w wool|strong="H6785"\w* and my \w flax|strong="H6593"\w*, mine \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* and my \w drink|strong="H8250"\w*.\f + \fr 2.5 \ft drink: Heb. drinks\f*

¶ Therefore, behold, I will \w hedge|strong="H7753"\w* up thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* with \w thorns|strong="H5518"\w*, and \w make|strong="H1443"\w* a \w wall|strong="H1447"\w*, that she shall not \w find|strong="H4672"\w* her \w paths|strong="H5410"\w*.\f + \fr 2.6 \ft make…: Heb. wall a wall\f*

And she shall \w follow|strong="H7291"\w* after her \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, but she shall not \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* them; and she shall \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* them, but shall not \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \add them:\add* then shall she \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to my \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*; for then \add was it\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* with me than \w now|strong="H6258"\w*.

For she did not \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* her \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, and \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, and \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* her \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \add which\add* they \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* for \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*.\f + \fr 2.8 \ft wine: Heb. new wine\f*\f + \fr 2.8 \ft which…: or, wherewith they made Baal\f*

Therefore will I \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* my \w corn|strong="H1715"\w* in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* thereof, and my \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* in the \w season|strong="H4150"\w* thereof, and will \w recover|strong="H5337"\w* my \w wool|strong="H6785"\w* and my \w flax|strong="H6593"\w* \add given\add* to \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* her \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.\f + \fr 2.9 \ft recover: or, take away\f*

And now will I \w discover|strong="H1540"\w* her \w lewdness|strong="H5040"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of her \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, and \w none|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* her out of mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 2.10 \ft lewdness: Heb. folly, or, villany\f*

I will also cause all her \w mirth|strong="H4885"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*, her feast \w days|strong="H2282"\w*, her new \w moons|strong="H2320"\w*, and her \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, and all her solemn \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*.

And I will \w destroy|strong="H8074"\w* her \w vines|strong="H1612"\w* and her fig \w trees|strong="H8384"\w*, whereof she hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, These \add are\add* my \w rewards|strong="H0866"\w* that my \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me: and I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* them a \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*, and the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* them.\f + \fr 2.12 \ft destroy: Heb. make desolate\f*

And I will \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* upon her the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*, wherein she burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* to them, and she \w decked|strong="H5710"\w* herself with her \w earrings|strong="H5141"\w* and her \w jewels|strong="H2484"\w*, and she \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* her \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, and \w forgat|strong="H7911"\w* me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Therefore, behold, I will \w allure|strong="H6601"\w* her, and \w bring|strong="H3212"\w* her into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w comfortably|strong="H3820"\w* unto her.\f + \fr 2.14 \ft comfortably: or, friendly: Heb. to her heart\f*

And I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* her her \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* from thence, and the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Achor|strong="H5911"\w* for a \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*: and she shall \w sing|strong="H6030"\w* there, as in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of her \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, and as in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when she came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And it shall be at that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add that\add* thou shalt \w call|strong="H7121"\w* me \w Ishi|strong="H0376"\w*; and shalt \w call|strong="H7121"\w* me no more \w Baali|strong="H1180"\w*.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft Ishi: that is, My husband\f*\f + \fr 2.16 \ft Baali: that is, My lord\f*

For I will take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w* out of her \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and they shall no more be \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* by their \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

And in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* will I \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* for them with the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and with the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \add with\add* the creeping \w things|strong="H7431"\w* of the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*: and I will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* and the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* and the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* out of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and will make them to lie \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w*.

And I will \w betroth|strong="H0781"\w* thee unto me for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; yea, I will \w betroth|strong="H0781"\w* thee unto me in \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and in \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w*, and in \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w*.
I will even \w betroth|strong="H0781"\w* thee unto me in \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w*: and thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, I will \w hear|strong="H6030"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I will \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and they shall \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*;

And the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* the \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, and the \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and the \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*; and they shall \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.

And I will \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* her unto me in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; and I will have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* upon her that had not obtained \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*; and I will \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to \add them which were\add* not my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Thou \add art\add* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Thou art\add* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
